document_data.name: The Purple Scar
document_data.mainbody: '''The Purple Scar''' was a festhall of note in the [[Cormyr]]ean capital city, [[Suzail]], opened in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The Purple Scar stood to the south of [[the Market (Suzail)|open-air market plaza]] and to the southeast of the [[Field-Gates]], facing the waters of the [[Dragonmere]]. Before the mid-14{{th}} century DR, the Purple Scar was a smithy-shop owned by [[Atham One-Eye]].
